title: AI Engineering Intern - Goldenset
description: Contributed to the Titans monorepo, primarily within the Apollo (AI Service). Designed and improved CSV-to-RAG processing pipelines, enabling structured data ingestion and semantic enrichment. Implemented and refined token-based chunking strategies (fixed, hierarchical, semantic, heading-aware) for scalable document processing. Integrated multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini) through a unified interface layer. Wrote unit tests and improved validation logic using PyTest. Participated in code reviews, PR discussions, and production-level debugging in a collaborative engineering environment.

title: Housekeeping Supervisor - Millbrook Resort
description: Supported IT maintenance of housekeeping systems, aiding in troubleshooting and upgrades. Created detailed SOPs and procurement workflows using Excel and Word, improving operational consistency. Developed a budget control system for hotel  supplies to optimize spending and reduce waste.

title: IT Intern - DKSH Malaysia
description: Implemented an electronic document signing system using SharePoint and JavaScript, reducing manual approval time and streamlining the document review workflow across departments. Collected and maintained comprehensive technical documentation for system configurations, workflows, and user guides to support internal IT operations and future onboarding.
